help-file.title: "DUERGAR DWARF"
help-file.content:
The duergar are an evil race of gray dwarves that live deep under the surface of the world, within the depths of the Underdark. Extremely cunning and wicked creatures, duergar are known for their deceit and evil ways. They hate all other races, except for the drow, with whom they have grudging trade relations. They are mortal enemies of the mountain dwarves.
Duergar are inordinately sturdy and strong, and have permanent ultravision. Like the drow, duergar are hurt by natural daylight and fire, and therefore travel to the surface rarely.
Duergar class list: Warrior, Cleric, Thief, Assassin, Mercenary.
Duergar stats: Duergar are stronger and hardier than humans, and somewhat more dexterous, but tend to be less intelligent and agile.
Duergar innate abilities: invisibility, strength, ultravision, UD-sneak, enlarge, hide
Warning: As one of the eight evil races on Duris, the duergar are extremely difficult to play and face many hardships. Their hometown has been specifically designed to make life hell, and death waits around every corner. Duergar will most certainly encounter situations that would be deemed "unfair" to any of the surface races. We did this to create a new challenge for those advanced players who have "beaten" the challenge of life on the surface world and are looking for something more difficult. You should NOT play a duergar unless you are a *very* advanced player and are used to the Duris style of MUDding, or are willing to face the hardships without complaint, as it is NOT easy.
